name: VR Sound Lab
description:
A personnal project to experiment dynamic sound & music with Wwise and Unity in VR.

Ambisonics buses with binaural rendering are used for ambiances and reverbs.

Bowling and skittles are musical (responding to velocity and hit).

All music and sounds are mine.

Controls :
- Free move : Left joystick
- Teleportation : Left trigger
- Snap turn : Right joystick
- Pick up : Grab buttons (left or right)
- Open menu : Left primary/secondary buttons (X or Y on Quest 2)
- Reset objects position : Right primary/secondary buttons (A or B on Quest 2)
